FuncDef:
The segment-routing ipv6 compatible command enables EVPN E-Line over SRv6 BE and EVPN L3VPN over SRv6 BE to perform weak verification of LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101 boards.
The undo segment-routing ipv6 compatible command disables this function.
By default, this function is not enabled.
ExtraInfo: The LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101 board does not support EVPN over SRv6. After the segment-routing ipv6 compatible command is configured, EVPN E-Line over SRv6 BE and EVPN L3VPN over SRv6 BE can be configured on such a device, and a prompt message is generated when EVPN E-Line over SRv6 BE or EVPN L3VPN over SRv6 BE is configured to indicate that the LPUF-50/LPUF-50-L/LPUI-21-L/LPUI-51-L/LPUF-51/LPUF-51-B/LPUI-51/LPUI-51-B/LPUS-51/LPUF-101/LPUF-101-B/LPUI-101/LPUI-101-B/LPUS-101 board does not support EVPN SRv6.
